title: Land with house
details:
19.75 Perches of Land with a house in the heart of Moratuwa, suitable for Residential or Housing complex.

Very close proximity to Moratuwa Railway/Bus Station, all Banks, churches/ temples, Government institutions, Super markets and all leading schools.

Clear titles and Bimsaviya certified. Available from October 2018. Rs 1,400,000 per perch
